English Language Arts Education (7-12).1: Make content knowledge accessible to students.
English Language Arts Education (7-12).2: Create, implement and assess instructional and curricular goals.
English Language Arts Education (7-12).3: Create and maintain a respectful and productive classroom learning environment.
English Language Arts Education (7-12).5: Deliver instruction that is considerate of student development, diversity, and special needs.
English Language Arts Education (7-12).6: Design and implement instructional units using backwards design; integrate sound, student-centered pedagogies in their practicum and student teaching placements; prioritize the promotion of critical thinking in their own and in their students’ learning; and understand the ways in which social theories of learning translate to practice.
English Language Arts Education (7-12).7: Apply theory and research in literacy to reading, writing, speaking and listening classroom practice.
